subject: Steroids
Perjury
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Reggie B. Walton, United States District Court judge for the District of Columbia, will preside over the Roger Clemens perjury trial this summer.
snippet: Reggie B. Walton, United States District Court judge for the District of Columbia, will preside over the Roger Clemens perjury trial this summer.
